name: Vrtillery
storyline: You are positioned on a cliff looking down onto a battlefield where enemies will walk towards you, you will aim using both controllers on the control panel in front of you whilst keeping an eye on the latitude and longitude that is on the mini-map screen. You will also have to load and fire your artillery gun.
summary: Vrtillery is a virtual reality war simulation, where you, the player, load, aim and fire an artillery cannon.
